title: the Gilded Imperator
intro: In the history of Everlight, no duo is as celebrated as Silver and Gold. Born to a lineage of Wyvernsworn knights, they represent the perfect synthesis of defense and offense. Where one goes, the other followsâ€”an inseparable force that has never lost a flank in the war against the Hellspawns. Everett wields a unique soulforge known as the Golden Sentry, a floating apparatus that hovers over the battlefield. From this vantage point, he rains down needles of pure light energy that will always bring victory to the Seventh Order.

abilities.name: Gilded Imprints
abilities.details: Everett's basic attacks, <span>Needle Work[/] and <span>Brilliant Dawn[/] embed <span>Golden Needles[/] on the target that stacks infinitely. Killing the enemy target will return all the <span>Golden Needles[/] back to him, earning him bonus [ar]gold[/] depending on the number of returned needles.

abilities.name: Needle Work
abilities.details:
Everett throws three needles in a target direction, each dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to the first enemy hit.

When shielded, Everett will throw [bf]five[/] needles instead.

abilities.name: Golden Sentry
abilities.details: Everett places a <span>Golden Sentry[/] at a target location, granting [bf]vision[/] in a small area for a short duration. When Everett basic attacks an enemy, if that enemy is within the <span>Golden Sentry[/]'s range, the sentry will also fire at the same target, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) per hit and applying a stack of <span>Golden Needle[/].

abilities.name: Auric Thread
abilities.details:
Everett pulls back all the Golden Needles[/], dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) based on the number of needles pulled back.

When shielded, the damage is [bf]increased[/] based on Everett's [ar]critical strike chance[/].

If an enemy is killed by this ability, Gilded Imprints[/]'s bonus gold gain will still be triggered.

abilities.name: Brilliant Dawn
abilities.details:
Everett channels the full power of his golden essence, gaining bonus [bf]attack range[/] and empowering his basic attacks to [bf]pierce through all enemies in a line[/].

If Everett is shielded while in this state, he will gain bonus [as]attack speed[/]. If the shield expires or is broken, the bonus stats will be lost.

While Brilliant Dawn[/] is active, Golden Sentry[/] also gains extended attack range, and its attacks will pierce through all enemies in a line, mirroring Everett's empowered basic attacks.
